data.title: Is Caleb Martin Related To Kenyon Martin- Are They Brothers?
data.meta_description: The NBA world is buzzing with a burning question, is Caleb Martin related to Kenyon Martin? In this article, we will discover if they are brothers and also delve into Calebs family. Caleb Martin is an American basketball player who currently plays for the Miami Heat in the NBA.
data.text:
The NBA world is buzzing with a burning question, is Caleb Martin related to Kenyon Martin? In this article, we will discover if they are brothers and also delve into Calebâs family.

Caleb Martin is an American basketball player who currently plays for the Miami Heat in the NBA.

He was born on September 28, 1995, in Winston-Salem, North Carolina. Martin attended college at both NC State and Nevada where he played basketball for their teams.

Further, Caleb stands at 6 feet 5 inches tall and is a small forward and power forward who shoots right-handed. He became known for his impressive athleticism and scoring abilities on the court.

However, Martin was not drafted in the 2019 NBA Draft and became a free agent. He signed with the Charlotte Hornets in October 2019, but was then assigned to Greensboro Swarm of the G League in November.

Later, in August 2021, the Hornets released him, and he signed a contract with the Miami Heat in September 2021.

Since 2021, Caleb Martin has been a member of the Miami Heat, where he has continued to showcase his skills and abilities on the court. He has been facing some knee soreness but continues playing even through the pain.

You Might Also Like: NBA Desmond Bane Brother: Meet His Sister Anna Bane, Ariyah Tanae And Jaylyn Wright

Is Caleb Martin Related To Kenyon Martin? Are They Brothers?

Caleb Martin and Kenyon Martin are not brothers but share the same last name.

Despite the similarity in their last name and both of them being involved in basketball, the two players are not related.

Kenyon Martin Jr. is also a basketball player who plays for the Houston Rockets in the NBA. He was born on January 6, 2001, in Gardena, California, and attended IMG Academy in Bradenton, Florida for his post graduate year.

Initially, Martin Jr. was drafted by the Sacramento Kings in the 2020 NBA Draft as the 52nd overall pick but was later traded to the Houston Rockets on November 25, 2020.

Likewise, Kenyon plays as a small forward for the Rockets and has been performing well, with an average of 12.7 points, 5.5 rebounds, and 1.5 assists per game.

Further, Martin Jr is the son of Kenyon Martin Sr, who himself is a retired NBA player who played for several teams throughout his 15 season career.

Also, Read: Who Is Jahvon Quinerly Brother Jaden? Age Gap and Family- NBA Mock Draft and Transfer News

Caleb Martin Family

Caleb Martinâs mother, Jenny Bennett, is white, and she raised Caleb and his siblings on her own. Not much is known about their father, except that he is African-American and was not present in their lives. Further, Caleb has an older brother named Raheem and a twin brother named Cody, who is also a professional basketball player in the NBA. The family faced financial difficulties and grew up in poverty. To support them, Jenny worked three jobs. Despite these challenges, Caleb and his brothers pursued their passion for basketball and worked hard to achieve their goals. Raheem Martin has experience as a coach and has recently been promoted to a coaching position on the Arkansas basketball team. On the other hand, Cody plays for the Charlotte Hornets in the NBA and the brothers have been teammates for a long time in high school and college. Although they share many similarities, Cody and Caleb have developed into distinct players with their own unique styles. More On Genius Celebs: NBA: What Is The Name Of Xavier Cooks Wife?
